name: sardines chermoula
ingredients: Chermoula Marinade: 7 garlic cloves, 1 tsp sweet paprika, pepper, cumin, ginger, turmeric, 1 tsp salt, juice of one lemon, 2-3 tbsp olive oil, chopped parsley and coriander
steps: Prepare the chermoula: Blend all the marinade ingredients (garlic, sweet paprika, pepper, cumin, ginger, turmeric, salt, lemon juice, olive oil, parsley, coriander).
Put a generous teaspoon of chermoula on each sardine fillet. Cover with another fillet (sandwich).
Coat the sardine fillets in flour. Tap to remove excess.
Fry in hot oil (or bake in the oven) until golden.
